findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations only last for three years, which may expose sensitive information to risks after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The definition of Confidential Information is broad, potentially leading to misunderstandings about what is protected.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information includes all proprietary information, trade secrets, business plans, financial data, and technical information disclosed by either party.
